org.cruk.genologics.api.jaxb

Class URIAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.xml.bind.annotation.adapters.XmlAdapter<String,URI>
      • org.cruk.genologics.api.jaxb.URIAdapter

  • public class URIAdapter
extends XmlAdapter<String,URI>
    Removes the "state" parameter from the query part of a URI string before converting to a URI object, or when converting back. Turns out this is probably a bad idea after all, so it has been disabled.
